rule.name: reportImpactAnalysisJson
rule.definition: load( local!appId, local!types: { "Application", "Content Item", "Data Store", "Datatype", "Group", "Group Type", "Page", "Process Model", "Process Model Folder", "Record", "Tempo Feed", "Tempo and Task Report (Ui Container)", "User" }, local!typeIds: { typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Application', 1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}ContentItem', 1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DataStore',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Datatype',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Group',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}GroupType',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Page',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}ProcessModel',1)), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}ProcessModelFolder',1)), typeof('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordType'()), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}TempoFeed',1)), typeof('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}UiContainer'()), typeof(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}User', "a")) }, local!includeTypes: local!typeIds, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Application Id", instructions: "Please enter the id of the application you wish to get the JSON of", value: local!appId, saveInto: { local!appId } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"( label: "Types", instructions: "Please select the types you wish to include", choiceLabels: local!types, choiceValues: local!typeIds, value: local!includeTypes, saveInto: { local!includeTypes } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Objects JSON", firstColumnContents: { with( local!includeTypesArray: if(isnull(local!includeTypes), {}, apply(fn!trim, split(local!includeTypes, ";"))), local!graphJson: if(isnull(local!appId), null, getgraphjson_appian_internal(local!appId, local!includeTypesArray)), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Graph JSON", value: local!graphJson ) ), with( local!includeTypesArray: if(isnull(local!includeTypes), {}, apply(fn!trim, split(local!includeTypes, ";"))), local!relationshipsJson: if(isnull(local!appId), null, getrelationshipsforallobjectsjson_appian_internal(local!appId, local!includeTypesArray)), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Relationships JSON", value: local!relationshipsJson ) ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Entry Points JSON", firstColumnContents: { with( local!includeTypesArray: if(isnull(local!includeTypes), {}, apply(fn!trim, split(local!includeTypes, ";"))), local!epGraphJson: if(isnull(local!appId), null, getgraphforentrypointsjson_appian_internal(local!appId, local!includeTypesArray)), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Graph JSON", value: local!epGraphJson ) ), with( local!includeTypesArray: if(isnull(local!includeTypes), {}, apply(fn!trim, split(local!includeTypes, ";"))), local!epRelationshipsJson: if(isnull(local!appId), null, getrelationshipsforentrypointsjson_appian_internal(local!appId, local!includeTypesArray)), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Relationships JSON", value: local!epRelationshipsJson ) ) } ) } ) )
